review: I love the fire stick. Worth every penny paid. It lets me access my prime content as well as other streaming services (netflix) and has apps and games to boot. But my favorite feature of this device is its portability. I can throw it in my luggage and take it with me on my travels. As long as I have internet access I can keep binge-watching my favorite shows from the hotel. Plus, it is much faster to boot up than the netflix app on my tivo and also a little easier to navigate.
author: T Rob
